report.title: The Most Amazing Sense In The World!
report.author: DreadedJoe
report.bodytext: Ahhh spice silver, in my opinion the fucking most best stuff I've ever had. /n /n 8:00 I put about half the 400mg sachet in to two bowls of a pipe and rip them one after the other, /n /n 8:05 I pack two more bowls and rip them both one after the other. /n /n 8:15 Wooooo! It just hit me, I look around the room I'm in, and think to my self 'Man this is amzing', I couldn't stop smiling and told my best mate what I'm feeling, he looked at me funny because he never thought it would do anything, but he was wrong, Very wrong! /n /n 8:25 Still can't stop smiling and saying to my mate that this is great, I stand up and it hits me more than ever, I feel like life is fucking great and everything is gonna be great and the world is an amazing place, /n /n 8:30 I go to sit down next to the computer and watch some youtube, leaning back as I watch random videos I still feel great and smiley :D /n /n 8:35 I can laugh at the funny videos as usual but not like cannabis were you laugh at anything its weird but in a great way, definatly reached my peak by now. /n /n 8:45 After feeling great or the past 3/4 of an hour things start to feel less great and back to normal, I feel like I would like some more to keep this amazing sense going but not as if I needed some. /n /n 9:00 Everythings fine now, I felt like I need sleep, but were all about to go out, so after a hit of real weed and things are all good again so off we go out :) /n /n /n I think that this experince was an amazing one to say the least, I'm looking forward to try it again or maybee spice gold. Deffinatly not a substitute for canabis but never felt a high like it. :D
